entry.title: About
entry.summary:
Hi friends! Iam Rag Sagar, FOSSill netizen from Palakkad(Kerala), doing 2nd year Btech IT at SSKCET Coimbatore.  `|my\_image|`_ You can find me online 24x7 ( not really :-p) in the irc channel #orkut_linux at freenode ( http://www.tuxopia.net/node/18 )
